title: Bob Saget’s Death Records to Stay Private for Now, Judge Rules
sub_head: Preliminary ruling grants family’s wish to block the release of graphic material
body:
A Florida judge on Wednesday issued a temporary block on the release of investigation records in Bob Saget’s death after his family filed a lawsuit seeking an injunction.
The family would suffer “irreparable harm in the form of severe mental pain, anguish and emotional distress” if their request wasn’t granted, the judge wrote in his decision.
